text: So pe: “A gbagbo ninu Allahu ati ohun ti Won sokale fun wa pelu ohun ti Won sokale fun (Anabi) ’Ibrohim, ’Ismo‘il, ’Ishaƙ, Ya‘ƙub, ati awon aromodomo (re. A gbagbo ninu) ohun ti Won fun (Anabi) Musa ati ‘Isa ati awon Anabi lati odo Oluwa won; A ko ya eni kan kan soto ninu won. Awa si ni musulumi (olujuwo-juse-sile) fun Un.”
